title: Process Denial for No Coverage
description: A claim is denied because the payer reports the patient did not have coverage on the date of service. The balance needs to be transferred to the patient.

tasks.expected_outcome: Biller identifies the denied claim and reason.

tasks.description: Verify that no other insurance is on file for the patient.
tasks.expected_outcome: Biller confirms there is no other active coverage in the patient's record.

tasks.description: Transfer the full balance of the claim to patient responsibility.
tasks.expected_outcome: The balance is moved from the insurance bucket to the patient bucket, so it will appear on the patient's next statement.
